CIPHER.0.cipherString: A moral being is one who is capable of reflecting on his past actions and their motives - of approving of some and disapproving of others.
CIPHER.0.question: Solve this aristocrat.

CIPHER.1.cipherString: My films are of paramount importance to me, the same as my family. That's not going to change. This is a balance I have to strike throughout my life.

CIPHER.2.cipherString: Our birth is but a sleep and a forgetting. Not in entire forgetfulness, and not in utter nakedness, but trailing clouds of glory do we come.

CIPHER.3.question: Encrypt this phrase with the key hell using the Hill cipher.

CIPHER.4.question: Encrypt this phrase with the key delf using the Hill cipher.

CIPHER.5.question: Decrypt this phrase with the key both using the Hill cipher.

CIPHER.6.question: Encrypt this phrase with the key glittered using the Hill cipher.

CIPHER.7.question: Encrypt this phrase with the key barnyards using the Hill cipher.

CIPHER.8.question: Decrypt this phrase with the key trumpeter using the Hill cipher.

CIPHER.9.cipherString: The best way to get the better of temptation is just to yield to it.
CIPHER.9.question: Decode this sentence with the Vigenere cipher using the keyword digest.

CIPHER.10.cipherString: If only those who dream about Hollywood knew how difficult it all is.
CIPHER.10.question: Decode this sentence with the Vigenere cipher using the keyword warming.

CIPHER.11.cipherString: Keep yourself to the sunshine and you cannot see the shadow.
CIPHER.11.question: Decode this sentence with the Vigenere cipher using the keyword profits.

CIPHER.12.cipherString: We didn't make no mistakes. We didn't make no mistakes.
CIPHER.12.question: Decode this sentence with the Vigenere cipher using the keyword packard.

CIPHER.13.cipherString: The more laws, the less justice.
CIPHER.13.question: Decode this quote which has been encoded using the Baconian cipher.

CIPHER.14.cipherString: I just want to live in peace and quiet.
CIPHER.14.question: Decode this quote which has been encoded using the Baconian cipher.

CIPHER.15.cipherString: The public is wiser than the wisest critic.
CIPHER.15.question: Decode this quote which has been encoded using the Baconian cipher.
